name: Second Hand Scuffle
description:
In this thrift-store-shoot-’em-up, you have to pay the price! With your trusty item, you must defend yourself from waves of possessed everyday items in order to make it out alive. Due to its unusual allergies, every sneeze makes your companion mutate into a completely different object! Whether it’s a revolver or an egg beater, you have to adapt on the fly to what your weapon gives you. With countless different weapons and enemies, each run is unique! (Did I mention your weapon talks to you? They do.)

The Team:

Programming: ADustyOldMuffin, jarofwombats

Art: Fruzmig

Art, Music: jpeg2k
